DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will evaluate weekly docetaxel plus 3-weekly cisplatin regimen as the first-line therapy for recurrent of metastatic nasophayngeal cancer
DOC.brief_title: Weekly Docetaxel Plus Cisplatin as the First-line Therapy for Nasopharyngeal Cancer
DOC.criteria: histologically confirmed nasopharyngeal cancer chemotherapy or radiotherapy naive (but, including patients completed 6 months before the enrollment) ECOG 01 at least one measurable lesion other cancer pregnat docetaxel hypersentitivity history severe heart or pulmonary disease
